synopsis.text: Naoko Watanabe, an ordinary middle school girl, has an extraordinary secret! When her anger reaches its peak, she transforms into Gauko, a fiery, dinosaur-like creature. Joined by her friends and some unexpected alien companions, Naoko's life is a rollercoaster of hilarious and absurd adventures as she navigates the challenges of being a tween with a monstrous twist. Prepare for a unique comedy series that blends everyday life with extraordinary abilities and a touch of intergalactic chaos!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
